---
title: "Data Wrangling"
output: pdf_document
---


```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(here)
library(scales)

getwd()
```

```{r load data}
#read in all data
Ellerbe_wq <- read.csv(here('Data/Raw/Ellerbe_water_quality_data.csv'), 
                    stringsAsFactors = TRUE)
Sandy_wq<- read.csv(here('Data/Raw/Sandy_water_quality_data.csv'), 
                    stringsAsFactors = TRUE)
```

```{r}
#Change Sample Date to date
Ellerbe_wq$Sample_date<-as.Date(Ellerbe_wq$Sample_date,format="%m/%d/%Y")
Sandy_wq$Sample_date<-as.Date(Sandy_wq$Sample_date,format="%m/%d/%Y")

#add a year column
Ellerbe_wq$year <- format(Ellerbe_wq$Sample_date, "%Y")
Sandy_wq$year <- format(Sandy_wq$Sample_date, "%Y")

#Data Wrangling
#dissolved oxygen
Ellerbe_wq$Dissolved_oxygen_mg.L <-
  as.numeric(as.character(Ellerbe_wq$Dissolved_oxygen_mg.L))

Sandy_wq$Dissolved_oxygen_mg.L <-
  as.numeric(as.character(Sandy_wq$Dissolved_oxygen_mg.L))

#Daily Mean Flow
Ellerbe_wq$Instantaneous_flow_cfs <-
  as.numeric(as.character(Ellerbe_wq$Instantaneous_flow_cfs))

Sandy_wq$Instantaneous_flow_cfs <-
  as.numeric(as.character(Sandy_wq$Instantaneous_flow_cfs))



```
